description: Say Bonjour to the all-new Mont Blanc, the ultimate long distance trail shoe inspired by the highest mountain in the Alps. This trail cruiser is designed with our Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam and our Standard FootShape™ Fit to provide ultimate comfort and our Vibram® LiteBase outsole for traction on any terrain. We have strategically added material where it’s needed and removed material where it’s not, resulting in a lightweight, breathable design ready for all-day trail excursions.
name: Altra Mont Blanc - Mens

specs.value: Their signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet
Their Balanced Cushioning™ platform positions your heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground, encouraging better alignment and better form
Their Altra EGO™ Max midsole foam gives you all the light and luxurious performance with a little extra bounce and added durability

According to Vibram®, Vibram® Litebase midsole reduces 30% of the overall sole weight through a reduction of the sole thickness by 50%, while maintaining Vibram quality in grip, traction, and durability
